AND M.breed_type IN
#{ptype}
AND U.user_no != #{myUserNo} AND U.user_no NOT IN ( SELECT F.follower_no FROM follow F WHERE F.following_no = #{myUserNo} ) AND U.user_no NOT IN ( SELECT F.following_no FROM follow F WHERE F.follower_no = #{myUserNo} ) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT pet_no AS petNo, user_no AS userNo, pet_name AS petName, pet_gender AS petGender, pet_type AS petType, breed_type AS breedType FROM mypet WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
